Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: more

Arguments.Name: -d
Arguments.Description: Prompt with '[Press space to continue, 'q' to quit.]', and display '[Press 'h' for instructions.]' instead of ringing the bell when an illegal key is pressed

Arguments.Name: -l
Arguments.Description: Do not pause after any line containing a ^L (form feed)

Arguments.Name: -f
Arguments.Description: Count logical lines, rather than screen lines

Arguments.Name: -p
Arguments.Description: Instead, clear the whole screen and then display the text

Arguments.Name: -c
Arguments.Description: Instead, paint each screen from the top, clearing the remainder of each line as it is displayed

Arguments.Name: -s
Arguments.Description: Squeeze multiple blank lines into one

Arguments.Name: -n
Arguments.Description: Specify the number of lines per screenful
